title: Bride of the Gorilla (restored, colorized) (1951, horror, imdb score: 4.4)

sources.title: Bride Of The Gorilla Colorized Movie 720p
sources.description: Bride of the Gorilla is a 1951 horror B-movie film written and directed by Curt Siodmak starring Raymond Burr , Lon Chaney Jr. , Barbara Payton and Tom Conway .
